text: Damien Varley (born 29 October 1983 in Limerick) is an Irish rugby union player for Munster in the Pro 12 and Heineken Cup. He plays as a Hooker. Varley plays his club rugby with Garryowen. Before he played for the London Wasps. == Life == Varley went to St. Munchin's College in Limerick. He scored two tries when his school won the Munster Schools Rugby Senior Cup final in 2002. He then studied at the University of Limerick. Varley played his first game for Munster in May 2006 against Ospreys in the Celtic League. In 2008, Varley joined the English club London Wasps on a one-year contract. He scored a try for them in his first game against Leicester Tigers. == References == == Other websites == *Wasps profile Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Irish rugby union players
title: Damien Varley
